languages.text: "Хех. Ничего, справимся. Выберемся. Еще гульнем на средней палубе... Что скажешь, Идира?"
"Heh. No worries, we'll pull through. We're going to get out of here. Soon we'll be letting loose on the middle deck just like before... What do you say, Idira?"
languages.original_text: "Хех. Ничего, справимся. Выберемся. Еще гульнем на средней палубе... Что скажешь, Идира?"

traits.locale_text: "Heh. No worries, we'll pull through. We're going to get out of here. Soon we'll be letting loose on the middle deck just like before... What do you say, Idira?"
"Heh. No worries, we'll pull through. We're going to get out of here. Soon we'll be letting loose on the middle deck just like before... What do you say, Idira?"
"Heh. No worries, we'll pull through. We're going to get out of here. Soon we'll be letting loose on the middle deck just like before... What do you say, Idira?"
"Heh. No worries, we'll pull through. We're going to get out of here. Soon we'll be letting loose on the middle deck just like before... What do you say, Idira?"

languages.text: “呵！别担心，我们会渡过难关的，我们就会离开这里的。很快，我们就可以像以前那样，在中层甲板上逍遥自在了……你说对吧，伊迪拉？”
languages.original_text: "Heh. No worries, we'll pull through. We're going to get out of here. Soon we'll be letting loose on the middle deck just like before... What do you say, Idira?"

traits.locale_text: “呵！别担心，我们会渡过难关的，我们就会离开这里的。很快，我们就可以像以前那样，在中层甲板上逍遥自在了……你说对吧，伊迪拉？”

languages.text: « Hé. Ne vous en faites pas, on va s'en sortir. On va réussir à s'enfuir d'ici. On sera de retour sur le pont intermédiaire à descendre des pintes en moins de temps qu'il ne faut pour le dire... Qu'est-ce que vous en dites, Idira ? »
languages.original_text: "Heh. No worries, we'll pull through. We're going to get out of here. Soon we'll be letting loose on the middle deck just like before... What do you say, Idira?"

traits.locale_text: « Hé. Ne vous en faites pas, on va s'en sortir. On va réussir à s'enfuir d'ici. On sera de retour sur le pont intermédiaire à descendre des pintes en moins de temps qu'il ne faut pour le dire... Qu'est-ce que vous en dites, Idira ? »

languages.text: «Je. No pasa nada, vamos a salir de esta. De aquí. Pronto volveremos a las juergas de la cubierta media como antes... ¿no crees, Idira?».
languages.original_text: "Heh. No worries, we'll pull through. We're going to get out of here. Soon we'll be letting loose on the middle deck just like before... What do you say, Idira?"

traits.locale_text: «Je. No pasa nada, vamos a salir de esta. De aquí. Pronto volveremos a las juergas de la cubierta media como antes... ¿no crees, Idira?».

languages.text: 「はん、心配いらない、アタシらなら乗り越えるさ。ここを出るんだ。すぐに前のように、中央デッキで羽を伸ばそう…どうだい、イディラ？」
languages.original_text: "Heh. No worries, we'll pull through. We're going to get out of here. Soon we'll be letting loose on the middle deck just like before... What do you say, Idira?"

traits.locale_text: 「はん、心配いらない、アタシらなら乗り越えるさ。ここを出るんだ。すぐに前のように、中央デッキで羽を伸ばそう…どうだい、イディラ？」

languages.text: "Ha. Keine Sorge, wir überstehen das. Wir werden von hier entkommen. Bald amüsieren wir uns wieder wie früher auf dem Mitteldeck ... Was sagt Ihr, Idira?"
languages.original_text: "Heh. No worries, we'll pull through. We're going to get out of here. Soon we'll be letting loose on the middle deck just like before... What do you say, Idira?"

traits.locale_text: "Ha. Keine Sorge, wir überstehen das. Wir werden von hier entkommen. Bald amüsieren wir uns wieder wie früher auf dem Mitteldeck ... Was sagt Ihr, Idira?"

languages.original_text: "Heh. No worries, we'll pull through. We're going to get out of here. Soon we'll be letting loose on the middle deck just like before... What do you say, Idira?"

languages.text: "Endişelenme, bunu da atlatacağız. Buradan çıkacağız. Yakında eskiden yaptığımız gibi orta güvertede koşturuyor olacağız. Ne dersin İdira?"
languages.original_text: "Heh. No worries, we'll pull through. We're going to get out of here. Soon we'll be letting loose on the middle deck just like before... What do you say, Idira?"

traits.locale_text: "Endişelenme, bunu da atlatacağız. Buradan çıkacağız. Yakında eskiden yaptığımız gibi orta güvertede koşturuyor olacağız. Ne dersin İdira?"
